news.title: Trump says U.S. oil companies will invest billions of dollars in Venezuela after Maduro’s overthrow
news.description: U.S. oil companies will invest billions of dollars in Venezuela's energy sector after the overthrow of Nicolas Maduro, President Donald Trump said.

news.title: Trump's removal of Maduro prompts questions from Congress
news.description: Congressional lawmakers say they were not briefed before President Donald Trump launched a land attack on Venezuela and deposed President Nicolas Maduro.

news.title: After a bruising 2025, the Fed faces another slew of challenges in the year ahead
news.description: The central bank heads into 2026 facing a slew of political and policy challenges.
